definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to review the old and know the new (idiom, from the Analects)/to recall the past to understand the future

sentences.english: So laughter can be like a “quick-charge” for our brain’s batteries. Laugh more, and laugh harder.
sentences.chinese: 故而笑能像我们大脑电池的一个“快速充电器”。

sentences.english: Out of town on business, I was hospitalize after a minor accident.
sentences.chinese: 一次在外地出差，因小事故而住进医院。

sentences.english: Therefore, early used as a dragon design on the symbol of the spirit of our nation.
sentences.chinese: 故而，很早龙纹就成为我们中华民族精神的象征。

sentences.english: The limestone is sufficiently fissured for tree roots to have breached the roof of the cave.
sentences.chinese: 石灰岩上有许多缝隙，故而树根能从岩洞顶部长出来。

sentences.english: Since students automatically went to neighborhood schools, schools did not have to compete for students.
sentences.chinese: 由于学生自动就近入学，故而学校并不争夺生源。

sentences.english: People make noises because they eat without closing their mouths.
sentences.chinese: 因为人们吃东西时没有闭上嘴，故而发出噪声。

sentences.english: Thus, on each cherry was glistening a rain drop.
sentences.chinese: 故而，每个樱桃果上都挂着晶莹的雨滴。

sentences.english: I imagine in summer evening, the somebody else sleeps late somely, hence emit night to visit him.
sentences.chinese: 我料想在夏天晚上，人家睡得晚些，故而冒夜去访他。

sentences.english: I worried half the night and have a fitful sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我半个晚上都一直在担心，故而时醒时睡。

sentences.english: Therefore, the strong feelings that human civilization is doomed to be destroyed permeate her works.
sentences.chinese: 故而，她的作品带着浓重的对整个人类文明的幻灭感。

sentences.english: I was happy for that, felt wonderful and interested in my soul.
sentences.chinese: 我故而乐之，小小的心灵里觉得十分奇妙，十分有趣。

sentences.english: Brown trout is named for the red tint on its eyes.
sentences.chinese: 赤眼鳟因其眼上有红色，故而得名。

sentences.english: Meeting the river are probably based on this, hence the name.
sentences.chinese: 大概是以江水都汇于此，故而得名。

sentences.english: That is, one feels that everything that happens is destiny's way of reaching its ultimate purpose, and so should be considered good.
sentences.chinese: 也即，他觉得万事皆择其命理之道而行之，故而为善。

definition: therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
that being the case/then/in that case
